transArray.content: I was very satisfied with my stay in the hotel room. The room was heated and very warm. The details were also cleaned very carefully and the windows were cleaned very brightly. It is very convenient to have a desk in the room! The location of the hotel is easy to find, with the road at the door and near Baliqiao subway station. Itâ€™s also very convenient to take a taxi to Universal Resort from here.
Dear guest, thank you very much for your choice. May everything in your past be a prologue and all your futures have something to look forward to. I love you, little man.
